title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.25 - Appointment year
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.25 - Appointment year

State Regulations

Unless the terms of appointment otherwise provide, the
normal appointment year shall be from September 1st to August 31st, regardless
of payroll mode; provided, however, that an academic year employee may be
required to commence the employee's professional obligation at a date
reasonably prior to September 1st as may be necessitated by a college's
operating requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
